name: nickel concentrate, 16% Ni to generic market for nickel-rich materials | nickel-rich materials | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23106/documentation

This is a renaming activity. It's purpose is to link 'nickel concentrate, 16% Ni' to the generic 'market for nickel-rich materials'.

Activity starts with the reception of 'nickel concentrate, 16% Ni'.

Activity ends with the 'nickel concentrate, 16% Ni' being ready for transportation.
